channel.title: command on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in command on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Differences in MacOS & Linux command
item.description: echo Useful commands Git related use history command: history ! + number of the past command crtl+A: start of a command, crtl+E: end of a command clear all pycache in current directory: find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} \; clear all .pyc file in current directory: find . -name "*.pyc" | xargs rm -f Docker related: inspect container ip address: docker inspect -f '{{range .
